item.title: Tool touch up : web content scanner 1
item.description: I noticed the web content scanner I wrote in go for this blog post does not work on websites using HTTPS when the TLS certificate cannot be validated. I decide to make some improvement to the code and generally refactor it. I initially wanted to add a flag to skip validating SSL/ TLS certificates. After mulling that over for a bit, I decided that adding a flag was not needed. Skipping the validating of certs can be the default behavior.
